description: Linear regression predicting a numeric score; returns coefficients and intercept
code:
def execute(testData):
    import numpy as np
    from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression

    X_train = np.array(testData.get("features", []))
    y_train = np.array(testData.get("labels", []))
    X_test = np.array(testData.get("testFeatures", []))

    model = LinearRegression()
    model.fit(X_train, y_train)

    preds = model.predict(X_test).tolist()

    return {
        "success": True,
        "predictions": preds,
        "coefficients": model.coef_.tolist(),
        "intercept": float(model.intercept_)
    }
